job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtCloud Engineering Infrastructure DevelopmentltbrgtltbrgtAre you interested in building largescale distributed infrastructure for the cloud Oracles Cloud Infrastructure OCI team is building new InfrastructureasaService technologies that operate at large scale in a broadly distributed multitenant cloud environment Our customers run their businesses on our cloud and our mission is to provide them with best in class foundational cloud infrastructure services The Virtual Networking Team builds the highly customizable Virtual Cloud Networks VCN and connectivity services offering predictable and consistent performance isolation and availabilityltbrgtltbrgthttpscloudoraclecomenUSnetworkingltbrgtltbrgtWe are a team that builds and maintains the OCI Software Defined Network SDN stack Currently we are looking for handson engineers with expertise and passion in solving difficult problems in highavailability virtualized networks and network packet processing These are exciting times and our team is undergoing rapid growth while working on many new ambitious initiatives An engineer at any level can have significant technical and business impact Join our team and help us build a stateoftheart IaaS network starting from the ground floorltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join VCN DataplaneltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Virtual Cloud Network VCN team has a culture of collaboration which welcomes new people to their ranks We not only focus on an excellent customer experience we also spend the time to make sure that your onboarding and rampup experience is a great one We work together and help each other out and do not skimp on technical debt which facilitates reasonable oncall and a good worklife balanceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a Sr Member of Technical Staff on the Dataplane team you will help design and develop major core components of Oracles Virtual Cloud Network You will be one of the engineers responsible for delivering highspeed packet processing architectures and other distributed systems that provide networking features such as TCPUDP packet processing access controls metrics and monitoring dashboardsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou are an expert C coder with networking and embedded system experience You value simplicity and scale work comfortably in a collaborative agile environment and are excited to learnltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBasic Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt4 years of experience with systemsapplication developmentltligtltligt2 years of experience with network programmingltligtltligt1 years of experience with embedded systemsltligtltligtProficient at programming in CC and experience with PythonltligtltligtProficient with LinuxltligtltligtBachelors in computer science and Engineering or related engineering fieldsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtPrior development experience with embedded C programming network protocol implementation or network DevelopmentltligtltligtPrior cloud experienceltligtltligtMasters  PhD degree in Computer Science or related engineering fieldltbrgtltligtltulgtDesign develop troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases applications tools networks etcltbrgtltbrgtAs a member of the software engineering division you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems Provide technical leadership to other software developers Specify design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needsltbrgtltbrgtDuties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment Fully competent in own area of expertise May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area 4 years of software engineering or related experienceltbrgtltbrgtIf you are a Colorado resident Please Contact us or Email us at oraclesalaryinquiriesusoraclecom to receive compensation and benefits information for this role Please include this Job ID 113262 in the subject line of the emailltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtInnovation starts with inclusion at Oracle We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and
